main event: A couple observed a saucer-shaped object with a dark area in the middle crashing into a mountain while deer hunting in Hickman Canyon, Utah on October 27, 1952.
interesting points: The object made a sound similar to an automobile., Extensive search of the area by air and ground found nothing., The sighting took place during severe weather conditions with gale force winds and heavy snow., Witnesses described the object as having two appendages in the forward section., The object was initially seen flying at an altitude of around 3,000 feet before crashing.
witness description: A couple engaged in deer hunting
